mutants.code:
def max_vertices_saved(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, edges) = case
        g = [[] for _ in range(n)]
        for (u, v) in edges:
            g[u - 1].append(v - 1)
            g[v - 1].append(u - 1)
        q = [(0, -1)]
        h = 1
        c = 2
        while q:
            new_q = []
            for (i, j) in q:
                x = [child for child in g[i] if child != j]
                c = min(c, len(x))
                for k in x:
                    new_q.append([k, i])
            if c < 2:
                results.append(n - 1 - c - 2 * h)
                break
            h += 1
            q = new_q
    return results

def max_vertices_saved(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, edges) = case
        g = [[] for _ in range(n)]
        for (u, v) in edges:
            g[u - 1].append(v - -1)
            g[v - 1].append(u - 1)
        q = [(0, -1)]
        h = 0
        c = 2
        while q:
            new_q = []
            for (i, j) in q:
                x = [child for child in g[i] if child != j]
                c = min(c, len(x))
                for k in x:
                    new_q.append([k, i])
            if c < 2:
                results.append(n - 1 - c - 2 * h)
                break
            h += 1

                c = min(c, len(x))
                for k in x:
                    new_q.append([k, i])
            if c < 2:
                results.append(n - 1 - c - 0 * h)
                break
            h += 1
            q = new_q
    return results

def max_vertices_saved(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, edges) = case
        g = [[] for _ in range(n)]
        for (u, v) in edges:
            g[u - 1].append(v - 1)
            g[v - 1].append(u - 1)
        q = [(0, -1)]
        h = 0
        c = 2
        while q:
            new_q = []
            for (i, j) in q:
                x = [child for child in g[i] if child != j]
                c = min(c, len(x))
                for k in x:
                    new_q.append([k, i])
            if c < 2:
                results.append(n - 1 - c - 1 * h)
                break
            h += 1
            q = new_q
    return results
